name: Harefolk
description: A small humanoid creature agile and clever, often depicted with fur and large ears.
memorable: Known for its Keen Smell and ability to navigate icy terrains effortlessly.
goals: Typically seeks to explore, gather information, or assist allies.
relations: Might ally with other humanoids and creatures skilled in stealth and exploration.
environment: Usually found in snowy regions or areas with hiding spots.
strengths: Excels in stealth, has advantage in snowy environments, and good at detecting shapechangers.
weaknesses: Vulnerable due to low hit points and not particularly strong in direct combat.
attacks: Can bite with sharp teeth, strike with a shortsword, or attack from afar with a sling.
most_powerful_ability: Ready for Trouble ability allows it to act quickly and avoid being surprised.
senses: Possesses keen senses with a passive perception of 13, enhancing its ability to detect hidden threats.
skills: Skilled in perception and survival, effective in detecting danger and navigating survival situations.
additional_information: Has advantage on initiative rolls when not incapacitated.
Can traverse icy surfaces without difficulty.
Gains advantage on stealth in snowy conditions.
test_queries: clever small creature in snowy terrain
agile humanoid with keen smell ability
small humanoid skilled in stealth and survival
